text: one could understand that after such an
attack people are looking for revenge
but when must also ask the question is
revenge really a proper response will it
bring anything positive as a final
result I'm really not sure that I mean
is it because we have under we suffered
violence that we have to give it back
and to react with violence I mean we we
don't only have stomachs will I hope
also have brains and I would like my
fellow countrymen to use it domestically
there should be a show of strength and
of unity and in the region there must be
a unified effort to solve the crisis I
mean yes for sure we have had 130 people
killed lat friday night in paris this is
terrible but there are 200 Syrians
killed every single day they had been
for the last four years I mean as long
as this crisis this revolution turned
into a civil war continues there I mean
we will have at some point to do to bear
a little part of this violence
